features: 💐【Fine Motor Development】: 6 different latches bucklesectrm, 12 basic skill, buckles, lacing, clasps, buttons, threading, matching, shoe lace tying etc. This sensory buckle pillow plush helps toddlers develop fine motor skills, cognitive skills, hand eye coordination, problem solving. Practice real life skills toddlers travel busy toy.

🚀【Learn Shapes Numbers Alphabet】 : Open the red button on the front of the sensory pillow toy to identify different shapes and the yellow upper on the front of the buckles sensory plush to identify ten numbers. At the back of the fidget toy, follow the numbers and cross thread, more like a matching game. And the letters are hidden in two easy glide zipper pocket on the back! 24 month girl toys educational.

✈【Great Travel Toy】: Toddler travel toy for 1-3 is great 'quiet' and travel toy! The busy board is well made and easy to carry. Fluffy polyester not hard foam makes very durable. Comfortable sense of touch for your kid. Busy board is great on long hour car rides and keep toddlers busy for a couple of hours, off and on, each way.

🎨【Attractive Colorful】: You can teach how to connect the same colors to one another or connect them to different colors. Fine motor develop toy holds kid’s attention. Bright, cheerful colors and cartoon pattern, bring visual stimulation preschool kids toddlers.Perfect for shopping cart, high chair, carseat.

💝【Great Therapy Tool】: This montessori toy also great for special needs students and sensory gyms and more, help children overcome obstacles better and grow up healthily. Busy boards for toddlers has a wide range of users, not just toddlers.Fidget pillow toy for dementia. It is helpful for cognitive behavioral therapy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for toddlers to bigger kids
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these, one for my 2 yo nephew and one for my 7 yo daughter. Both are enjoying it. So it’s a fun toy for multiple age groups. Good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great activity pillow to practice fine motor and adaptive skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars We cut parts off due to safety concerns
reviews.reviewText: Good engaging toy, however the manufacturer should consider removing the metal buckle (can damage gums or eyes) and the plastic ends of the laces, which can be bit off and swallowed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun for toddler
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter loves this. She has learned to unzip and has lots of fun with it. A great take a long for a car ride.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pillow to small need to be a little bigger other than that is OK
reviews.reviewText: Pillow to small need to be a little bigger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my two year old loves this
reviews.reviewText: my two year old loves this toy! it's great for long car rides or just something for him to play with at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ENTERTAINMENT THAT LASTS
reviews.reviewText: My son is 2 and loves to buckle anything from the high chair seat and stroller seat to the dog leash. I was going to make something at first but then figured amazon must have something. I searched and there it was! there are a set of buttons, laces, 2 zippers and about 9 buckles and he is obsessed. it keeps him busy, definitely helps with fine motor skills and hand eye coordination. I highly recommend this product. it is a nice size to bring anywhere!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel toy
reviews.reviewText: My 15 year old loves this toy, it’s very difficult for him to use so young but he spends a lot of time in the car concentrating on this toy
